mapper.insert: insert into user_comments(user_id, commenter_id, create_time, info) values(#{userId}, #{commenterId}, #{createTime}, #{info});
mapper.select: SELECT user_comments.user_id, users.avatar, user_comments.commenter_id, user_comments.create_time, user_comments.info FROM user_comments INNER JOIN users ON user_comments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.user_id=#{userId}
